header.subtitle: Neverwinter's #1 independent news source and community from 2015 - 2019!

errors.catError: There was an issue loading this section. Please refresh the page to try again.
errors.ctaError: There was an issue loading this section. Click here to try again.

sourceModal.info: Help us create the most comprehensive list of Neverwinter articles, discussions, social posts, and media by adding sources that you feel aren't included in our engine. Please include a direct link to the content, channel, or feed that you would like us to crawl. Otherwise make sure to add a detailed description of what you'd like to have included.

placeholders.desc: Please enter additional info if possible

up.data: The crawl engine is up and running, updating {itemsPerDay} of {totalItems} items ({percentage}%) per day.
up.help: The engine needs funding to improve the numbers of crawled items per day. Click here to see why and how you can help!

down.data: The crawl engine is offline, but has updated {itemsPerDay} of {totalItems} items ({percentage}%) in the last 24 hours.
down.help: The engine needs funding to run more hours per day. Click here to see why and how you can help!

loading.help: The engine needs funding. Click here to see why and how you can help!

patreons.mention: Thanks to these awesome donors, the Neverwinter community has access to auction house data!
